website_summaries.verdict: Natural materials come together to construct a sturdy and efficient nut milk bag that you'll feel safe using.
pros: Fabric, stitches, and drawstring are all made from organic materials
Large bag is ideal for big batches of milk
Bag is easy to wipe clean and can be thrown in with regular laundry
Bag is durable with quality stitching
Tightly woven fabric filters out even the smallest pulp
cons: The drawstring is thin and sometimes hard to get a hold of

customer_reviews.title: While I do like the bag
customer_reviews.text: While I do like the bag, it imtakes FOREVER to squeeze juice through it as the pulp gets clogged due to the fabric being super tightly woven!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nut milk bag that was not only made out of organic cotton but hopefully also made in the USA. There just had to be options right? Well most nut milk bags on amazon seem to be made out of nylon and are imported from Asia, that is until I saw Eco Peaceful's product. I am very happy to support this company's mission in creating products that are both sustainable, made locally and eco-conscious. I just made my first batch of almond milk today and I must say that I yield so much more nut milk with this bag than I ever did with nylon bags!
customer_reviews.author: TeacherLeeez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS ORGANIC NUT MILK BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I have used another brand in the past, claiming to be organic. It wasn't. THIS nut milk bag from USA Organic, arrived and I was very, very excited! First, it is so much larger than the average ones. I mean REALLY larger! And the quality was noticeable from the moment I took it out of the packaging. When you really care about a product being sourced from 100% Organic materials, especially when it is touching the food you eat, you want what is being claimed. This one is truly the best nut milk bag I've ever purchased. Highly recommend for like-minded individuals.
customer_reviews.author: GirlOfPeace

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Use it for "juicing" w Vita Mix. After mixing and emulsifying my greens in Vita Mix ( which i will never give up) I strain thru bag to obtain the thin consistency for juice as opposed to smoothie. Then after "milking" juice from bag i scrape whats left from the bag and feed it to my plants. Washes clean dries fast. Love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for LOOSE TEA - Not so great for NUT MILKS
customer_reviews.text: After blending 7 cups of water + 1 cup of soaked cashews in a Vitamix, this nut milk bag STILL took forever to strain. Eventually I lost patience and just used a thinner one from another company, that I've been using for years. For NUT MILKS, I would NOT recommend this at all. For LOOSE TEA, it's GREAT. Very effective!
customer_reviews.author: PG67

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR OAT MILK (unless you have lots of time to strain)
customer_reviews.text: It's my own fault. Although I did read some reviews, I didn't read deep into the Q&A or pay close enough attention to the product description. Had I done so, I would have known w/ 100% certainty that it shouldn't be used for oat milk. I got sucked into the plastic-free & organic aspects & tried it anyway. Bad idea. It took too long to strain; I got frustrated & just dumped it all into the pitcher. I'm going to attempt making an actual NUT milk & see how it handles. If I can't even do that right, well, I'll have another bag to use for bulk goods at the grocery store. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: "The fabric is tightly woven" making it difficult and time consuming
customer_reviews.text: :( I am returning the EcoPeaceful Nut Milk Bag because of the tightly woven fabric which caused filtration to be difficult and extremely time-consuming. It is clearly stated in the product description, however, I read the review that had the most "helpful" hits and wanted to believe it because it stated, "ECO PEACEFUL must have listened to their customers complaints and redesigned their product. The Nut Milk Bag was so easy to use. The milk drained from the bag quickly and the squeezing process was effortless." The truth is clearly stated in the product description. Had I stayed with the product information I would not have purchased it. PLEASE UNDO my "helpful" click.
customer_reviews.author: joe rock

customer_reviews.title: One of the most versatile tools in my kitchen and home bar
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this bag to make almond milk for homemade orgeat, but since then I have used this thing for so many tasks I never would have originally thought I would. So far I've also used it to strain fresh watermelon juice, to fine-filter mush out of homemade banana liqueur, as a breathable storage bag for homemade bread - hell, I've even used it as a Lewis bag and beaten the crap out of it with a giant wooden mallet while full of ice cubes, and it's never torn or lost integrity. This thing rocks, and if you spend a lot of time in the kitchen, you *will* find uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Labonte

customer_reviews.title: Weave is too tight to let liquid through!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to make oat milk and the weave is so tight that it does not let any milk through when squeezing! I had to have my boyfriend help me because I couldn't squeeze it hard enough for anything to come through. When he was trying it he ended up busting a seam trying to squeeze it so much. We had a good laugh at least! I appreciate the compostable packaging and natural materials but this simply did not work
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: A Nut Milk Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I was using a Nylon nut milk bag prior to this, didn't like how the almond pulp stuck to that bag, didnt like the cleaning process, and seemed to become more misshapen with use. I like the fact that this bag is cotton, sturdy and made in the USA. I use it solely for Almond Milk. It was very easy to sanitize and clean, it dries quickly, and is keeping its shape. Do not be too concerned with the weave, it is tighter than a nylon bag but I was able to strain out the milk from pulp just the same bonus being not having a bunch of almond pulp stuck to the fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Starling

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for straining zucchini & other watery vegetables. Wow! This is amazingly sturdy and drains out the excess water well. Before I had a cheesecloth which was the most annoying thing. This bag is awesome though, I love that it's reusable, strong and super easy to clean. My suggestion is to wash it immediately after use. It will turn green (from the zucchini) but like I said, wash it with dish soap and the green will come right out. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: The quality is most important  to me and being made in the USA is part of the quality
customer_reviews.text: I chose this bag because it is made here in the United States and because it was 100% organic. It sounded like a high quality nut milk bag and the ad can't do it justice. It is hard to describe it, the material itself is far higher quality then I expected and the stitching is flawless. It is larger than I had expected and works better then any bags I have tried. Anything of quality has a difference to it and this is no exception. Well worth the price I paid for it (yes, I paid full price)
customer_reviews.author: linda nofsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great to use as Coffee Filter!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to filter coffee. I could not find a USA made coffee maker without plastic components, so I use this nut milk bag in a simple Pyrex 4-cup measuring cup and it works great. It sits perfectly, covering the entire inside (with a little extra on top). I pour the grounds in, add hot water and let it steep for about 5 minutes, then take out the nut bag with the grounds. It strains all of it. I have not found any grounds in my coffee whatsoever. PS. I love that EcoPeaceful sends them in a recycled paper envelope (no plastic). LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: mommy2010

customer_reviews.title: What the heck???!!!! This doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't strain anything! No matter how much water I use to blend up a nut milk, this bag doesn't strain it! What a waste of money! I tried it inside out, right side out, I did everything as was suggested in the description and nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: marnster

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA - Organic - Love, Love Loved it- lst time user- BUY THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: First time making almond milk - I love this nut bag- Works like a dream - So many positive things about it. I did a lot of research before purchasing - I believe this is THE BEST ONE ALL AROUND - My almond milk is delicious and I will definitely reorder this bag, when necessary - THANKS . I'm so happy. Please buy USA when you have a choice :)
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying this from Buenos Aires, Argentina. Love that it is made from unbleached & undyed fibers! Appreciated a lot the pieces of advice included in the package...they helped me a lot since from time to time some of my nut milks were going bad in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania Pagniez

customer_reviews.title: Durable and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this bag and use it frequently to make almond milk. It's durable; just use your hand power to squeeze all the liquid out as needed. I've never used it yet to just hang and drain on its own but I'm sure that would take longer than just squeezing it yourself. I'll be ordering another one just for draining elderberries (since I'm oretty sure I'll be staining rhat one purple). I wash my nutbag by hand right after use with a little natural dish soap and water then rinse it with filtered water before air-drying it as well as right before use.
customer_reviews.author: meadowlark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had this nutmilk bag for a few weeks and used it several times to make almond milk. It strains well and for clean up I just hand wash it immediately after use and hang it to dry by the window where it gets sunlight. Dries fast so I've had no problems. It's sturdy and seems well made. I will update later if I have any issues but so far I'm 100% happy with my purchase. I was looking for something organic and sustainable and not made in China and since local or USA made hemp nutmilk bags are hard to come by, this was the best option I could find and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Juicing Celery
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant when I ordered this item after reading some of the reviews- but I was sold on this bag because it contains no synthetics. It is extremely durable and is perfect for juicing celery. I was on the fence about buying a juicer, but this has solved my problem. The size is perfect and it the juice flows through freely with minimal work on the wrists and hands. Sooo much better than the cheesecloth I was using and whole lot less expensive than a juicer. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Enslow

customer_reviews.title: Painfully hard to use for oat milk
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find a product with high reviews. The main use for me is making oat milk. I should start by saying that I have a Vitamix blender - so before I pour the milk into the bag, it is already blended well. Unfortunately, the fabric is woven so tightly that one cup of oat milk takes about 20 mins of squeezing to get the milk out of the bag. My hands were pretty sore by the time I was done. I have tried this 2x now - just to make sure it was not a weird fluke the first time. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: teen aka Christine Zinna

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is Organic but..
customer_reviews.text: I find it takes FOREVER to squeeze the milk out as it is too tightly woven. Compared to my other nut milk bag it is just way less convenient. And the draw string does not really pull all the way tight to close the opening so then the pulp spills out of the top. Overall just too messy and difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Alon

customer_reviews.title: Nothing comes out!
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviewers that said nothing comes out of this bag because it is totally true—nothing comes out. I have never used one of these before so perhaps it performs as expected for those who use them. But for me I was trying to make my own oat milk and what little I got was tasteless and watery. Not a good first foray into making my own milks. I feel like the bag can be used for other things so it is fine in the end, but it really didn’t work for me for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: According enclosed instructions first I sanitize the bag in boiling water, then I use it for my wild grape wine making - straining. First it goes easily, but then fermented "silt" covers walls of the bag and straining becomes harder. I used all my strength to twist and squeeze, straining slowed down, but the bag was holding very well. After use I washed it, let dried on line. Before next use I put it into boiling water again to sanitize it..
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Organic cotton
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well with almond and hemp seeds that were soaked overnight and then blended for a minute in a ninja iq blender. I will be trying a bean milk next. Very durable. The label says organic but has no smell so I can't verify it is organic but I wasn't allergic to the milk. I cleaned it with Bronner castile soap and put a set of large tongs inside and stood it up to dry faster.
customer_reviews.author: VitaTTop Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, easy to use/wash, strains excellently
customer_reviews.text: New to homemade almond milk, initially used a cheese cloth to strain. It worked, but cumbersome, and I had read that but milk bags were the way to go if you're going to really make your own. Searched Amazon, their ad caught my eye but as I read it, I decided to go with it vs bags that were $5 cheaper. I believe we get what we pay for in life....just used it for the first time and very happy with it. No pulp got squeezed into the jar, perfect straining. I have confidence in the material being pure and construction being solid. Comes with suggestions and instructions for using, washing and sanitizing. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Ricciotti

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, better than nylon  in many ways!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this bag for the first time, replacing my old nylon mesh bag. I made almond milk and was surprised at how efficiently the bag drained, even better than the nylon bag that did not have as tight a weave. It was easy to clean and is a generous size. I can't speak to long term durability, but it seems like it is very well made. I appreciate a company willing to go the extra mile to ensure that their product is made with quality materials and construction.
customer_reviews.author: T.D.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made bag, both the cloth material and the sticking looks pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and pretty sturdy bag. The cloth material is very thick. It can handle lot of squeezing, twisting and tugging for a long time.. I use this for straining juices ( for my picky 6 year old, of course) and It worked like a charm for greens and Watermelon. However I gave 4 stars becoz I had to put lot of efforts while squeezing the berries (strawberries and blueberries - these are what I have tried so far), maybe because of the strawberry seeds. Please Feel free to suggest me how I can do it easily.. The greens juice strained from this bag was very tasty. I would buy this bag again..
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use for yogurt making and wound up having to purchase two more sets because I use them for so much more. I am an active fermenter and use different ones to strain my various kvasses, hot sauces, dairy, etc. They clean up nicely and I love that they are made of organic cotton. The silicone band is great too, it holds the bag firmly on a wide mouth mason jar. Thanks for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria L Scotto di Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the reviews I purchased this to make almond milk. It was near effortless and extremely easy to use and did an excellent job filtering. I would purchase again and I like that it is made with pride in the USA. This has a good ROI as I was paying over $7 per quart of organic almond milk the the local Organic store not to mention the taste is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Monika M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I was SO pleased when I made celery juice. I put the bag over a bowl then put in the celery that I put through the vitamin in the bottom of the bag. I was able to keep ingredients in the bottom of the bag and was able to easily twist the ingredients inside the bag and have the just the juice come through the bag with all pulp staying in the bag. It truly took the frustration out of getting just the juice in a glass to drink. It only took a couple of minutes to clean and hang up to dry. Would definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Very high-quality, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this in that bag and made my first batch of almond milk. It worked very well. I boiled it for 15 minutes as the directions say to do. It was easy cleanup as I just rinse the bag out good and then put it over a pitcher to dry. The bag is very large so it could be used for many purposes. Very well-made and high-quality material that you can feel good about too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Louks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use to make cold brew coffee
customer_reviews.text: I chose this particular product over a similar one because it seemed sized right to fit in the mason jar I have to make cold brew coffee. And it is. Made my first batch of cold brew, squeezed the bag into a larger bowl (to avoid drips) and was please to find that there was no sludgy residue in the brew. Yea. Can't wait until warmer weather when I will probably make more cold brew for iced coffee drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, likely to retain stain, sturdy won't rip with heavy squeeze.  won't shrink and  Very fine filter.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not easy to clean due to not nylon material that likely to retain stain, sturdy won't rip with heavy squeeze. won't shrink and not intended to filter berries it would dye color. Very fine filter.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not good for oatmilk making
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this to make homemade oat milk but the bag weave was so tight, it barely let any of the liquid through. I ended up hurting my hands trying to filter through this bag.
customer_reviews.author: GeierGal

customer_reviews.title: High quality filtration bag
customer_reviews.text: Currently using this to make cold brewed coffee, works very well using standard half gallon ball jars. Filters out the majority of sediment, leaving only the very fine particles which is completely acceptable. I've squeezed the bag pretty good and the seams have held up well, so construction seems quite sound. Cleans quickly and easily with just a rinse. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Salimoneus

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my purchased a couple of days ago, it came very fast and the packaging was great!!! Although I have not tried using the bag yet it is a very nice size and I am hoping it will be a good product that will hold up over time! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Product is organic with no artificial fibers and made in USA.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for straining celery juice. I am not excited about hand washing after each use as instructions recommended rather than machine wash.
customer_reviews.author: Talibear792

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and needed to make my own nut milk!
customer_reviews.text: EcoPeaceful Nut Milk Bag arrived in perfect condition and was exactly as described. I have used it about 5 times now...still sturdy as the first time. Seams on the outside...super! I did wash it with a tiny bit of dish soap before first use as directed. This is made in the USA. I love that. Thanks for a great product. If it ever wears out...I will buy another from you!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu & Ernestines Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product based on some of the negative reviews of the fabric being woven too tightly and hard to squeeze out the milk but I just tried it out today and it worked great! There was no smell with the bag and it felt high quality to me. I’ve only used it once so far so we will see how it holds up. The milk drained right through and I was able to squeeze out the rest no problem.
customer_reviews.author: great movie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to strain my celery juice until juicer arrives.. pleased with how fast this shipped, according to schedule. I don't have a problem with it straining, doesn't seen too tightly woven to me. Juice starts draining out as soon as I dump the blended contents into it. Rinses off easily.. after emptying the pulp out I turn it inside out, give it a dunk and rub off any remaining pulp pieces, followed by a good rinse, then hang to dry. I love and feel so good that it's made with the materials it is. Intending to also use this for nut milks. I can see this being utilized for camping..
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Well Informed By Seller
customer_reviews.text: Included directions printed in recycled paper with almond milk recipe - couldn’t have been easier! The information seems like it’s likely to get moldy over time if not completely dried through, so I hung mine in front of an air vent to be on the safe side, dried in a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Bajorek

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use perfect size easy to rinse good quality material. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: P.Kastella

customer_reviews.title: Useless, waste money
customer_reviews.text: Too slow, even don’t drop. Waste of money. The material is too thick, it also has bad smell, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as stated great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what it said it would be. I was hesitant because I saw the reviews that said they could make that milk with it. I had no problems at all and it cleaned up really easy. I’m really enjoying my bag and will definitely recommend it and buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Maraudergirl

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT for my cold brew!!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT for my cold brew!! I was always having issues with I guess what you could call like a pulp or residue out of my cold brew unit but this solved that 100% It made cleanup a total breeze I even get more total cold brew now because I can physically pick up the bag and squeeze it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product- don't buy the Chinese made crap..
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these, and use them for making celery juice and nut milk. They are durable (had the first one for a year already). They work well for all my uses. Love that they are 100% organic. Don't hesitate on these, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just brought this bag in July and it already has a hole. soooo it does not whole up to everyday use.....
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I find this nut bag extremely difficult to use. It takes forever to strain out the milk I will go back to using an Ellies Best Nut Bag like I have used in the past even though I was intrigued with the thought of using an organic cotton nut bag.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Easy
customer_reviews.text: I have used my nutbag a handful of times since my purchase. It is awesome!! Easy to use, and I haven’t squeezed with kid gloves, easy to wash. After reading many reviews on other nut bags - I made the right choice w/EcoPeaceful. My only concern is being able to properly dry it because living in Ohio - we haven’t seen the sun for a month with a long winter ahead 😞
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: A recommended purchase
customer_reviews.text: The construction of these EcoPeaceful 12"x13" Organic Cotton Nut Milk Bags is great. I like that the seams are on the outside of the bag. The strength of these bags is way superior to some other non-organic flimsy nylon bags the I have owned and had disintegrate! I will definitely be purhasing again when I need more or replacements. These bags are organic and I trust this aspect over other similar bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ross J.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for draining whey out to make cream cheese and it worked. Also gave it a few forceful squeezes and it didn't break, so it's pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: ARRE iiSYSii

customer_reviews.title: Works great! So happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Tried to do a mascarpone cheese and it works great. All liquid went out of the bag and I don’t need to squeeze it. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Aliya

customer_reviews.title: This coupled with a blender works better...
customer_reviews.text: This coupled with a blender works better than a juicer, less clutter on the counter & cheaper. Only thing is... You need a bit of strength in you hands to get the maximum yield.
customer_reviews.author: Citsym Nogard

customer_reviews.title: Works well, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make almond milk for the first time. It works well. Plus its a well made quality all organic product that does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Kepner

customer_reviews.title: So Happy With this!
customer_reviews.text: I was a littler nervous to order this after reading a couple reviews that said it's hard to squeeze the liquid out...So glad I still ordered it because the product works great! No problems using it, easy to clean, feels durable, made delicious almond milk free of chemicals :)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Based on product reviews that the twine was too tight for the fluid to flow through caused me to think twice about purchasing. But, based on owners description for starting the company and that there are no plastics, dye, or other harmful materials included... I decided to proceed with my purchase. I must say I am extremely pleased! The fluid flows through fine and I have been able to collect more fluid than using cheesecloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag to remove fine pulp from raspberry juice. Worked very well got most of the juice out. Clean up was easy and didn’t stain the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Really,really like this bag!! Been using something else to make my coconut milk, but this works wonderfully. The top opening is large enough to put my cusinart top into it, to pour the coconut milk. Did not find it any harder to squeeze than what I had been using-maybe easier. Good quality bag and easy to clean if used as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Great Organic Nut Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just in case I needed it for our homemade almond milk and my husband and I use this at least 1-2 times a week! It's been a great purchase for us and is excellent for juicing too! Got one for the mother in law too. Love that it's organic.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: The perfect veggie strainer!
customer_reviews.text: I use it after I've blended lots of celery for my celery juice. Great every time!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this nut milk bag because it is made in the U.S.A. and certified as entirely 100% organic cotton. What a difference it made in my homemade almond milk. A few reviewers stated that the milk was slow to drain but if you follow the initial use directions in the package, this is a non-issue. It's great to support a company that is producing environmentally friendly products. Win/win!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: I love that this nut bag is made from 100% organic ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this nut bag is made from 100% organic materials unlike so many of the nylon nut milk bags out there. My only gripe is that personally, I find it quite a lot of work to strain liquids through this bag. I wish the weave wasn't quite so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: You won’t ever want a different nut milk bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing nut milk bag. AMAZING!!! The best one out there. And then it’s also organic and truly 100% cotton! The nut milk is so smooth. No grittiness! This one is really the best. And it even cleans well. I’m ordering at least one more!
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Nuts about Big Nut Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bag with drawstring. It is a little hard to close completely with the drawstring. I am going to wash it before use and am hoping it will get a little more flexible. I think it will be a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nut milk bag. I thought it might be too big when i first opened it but it's a perfect size for making 6-9 cups of almond milk. It's held up well. When using it I make sure the seams are on the outside, and it's easy to clean with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Parker

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t want to live without it
customer_reviews.text: I needed this before I even knew I needed this. It has made all of my nut and seed milk is amazing. Quick and easy to clean and feels so far very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: did the job anyway
customer_reviews.text: I used it to strain some yogurt and it did the work,but the silicone band closure torn in apart from the first try. I did it without it , so overall it's in use but a little disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer MirandaP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and they clean up great. I make almond milk. Pouring it this bag and squeezing the liquid out is terrific. Now I need to find out what I can do with the almond pulp. I love the fact they are made here in the USA too.
customer_reviews.author: Sueb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag. I use it to drain my curds in cheese making. I will buy another when this wears out. Good quality material so it will last a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that they are 100% organic!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. They are large enough to do a lot of milk, and also strong enough to use over and over. I've had them for at least a month and have used them a couple dozen times. They clean up easily and dry quickly, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Digital R

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I am still a little pixelated regarding using the bag with the seam in or seam out. With the seam inside the outside ring can be used to securely close the bag. With it outside you cannot use the ring.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Cowell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag a couple of years ago. I use it a couple of times a month to make my own fresh almond milk, which by the way is so much better than store bought. After use I turn the bag inside out and hand wash it and hang it to dry. Works very well. I like new, so its a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Bieke

customer_reviews.title: A bag I trust
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and unlike other bags that are made in CHINA, I believe this one when it says "ALL 100% Organic Cotton (Fabric, Stitches, Drawstring) - No hidden Synthetics".
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, and great for anything will you like to filter out the pulp, fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Ingber

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I make celery juice in my ninja and strain it thru the bag every morning. Works great! And I have been using it for months, the cheaper ones last only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Bag
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the thick fabric used to make the Nut Bag, and I expect it to be very durable over time. Because of the tightly woven fabric, it was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: RMoore

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for your nuts !
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product !! I had been using cheesecloth.to make my Almond milk. The process typically took about 30 minutes to get enough of the pulp out to where my wife and I like it. This bag gets all that done in about 5 minutes and the milk tastes amazing ! If you want to make your nuts into milk then this is the bag for you !
customer_reviews.author: matt capps

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nut milk bag, it worked perfectly! It's very sturdy, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product!! I had to buy from Amazon because my local co-op and Whole Foods only sold synthetic bags that were not made in the USA. The bag worked great and I appreciate the very detailed cleaning instructions provided. I bought this bag along with Weck Juice Jars...perfect for storing fresh nut milk. Totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsSmith

customer_reviews.title: Cotton nut milk bag
customer_reviews.text: First use went well. Made cold bread coffee. Item worked as expected and it appears to be high quality. I cannot tell but based on the feel and look I would expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag! Perfect for making celery juice with a blender.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make fresh celery juice each morning with my blender - no need for an expensive juicer if you have this bag and a blender! Perfect juice every morning, easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: The Lighthouse Mama

customer_reviews.title: Worth a bit of extra effort to have organic and USA-made
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated, I found it harder and more time consuming to strain my nut milk in this bag vs. my old bag (which was the nut milk bag bag that came with my InstantPot blender). That said, is the bag that came with my InstantPot blender made in the USA of organic materials? Who knows, but I highly doubt it! I’m satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this to strain homemade horchata. Might need to be boiled after a few times because of the cinnamon, but it was an easy process to clean!
customer_reviews.author: creative cook in the kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Good for certain uses
customer_reviews.text: Good product but a pain to clean after use with coffee grounds
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for straining blended celery. It works like a charm and is very easy to clean. I really like that it is made with organic cotton. The handy little band was an unexpected bonus and it is cleverly attached so it won't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Zick

customer_reviews.title: The milk bag you need for yum. Nylon bags= undrinkable product.
customer_reviews.text: My almond milk is now much better than anything I could buy. This was not true with nylon bag that I previously used. Had to remove all the almond skin in order to get something just ok as end result. This bag is sturdy and doesn't release bits of almond skin into the milk. Use with seams on the OUTSIDE for easy cleaning. Milk is sooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using mesh bags for years, but they don't hold up very well. This bag is so strong, and lets the liquid through so much more. Cleans up so much easier than I expected. When I do a YT video using these I will highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to filter clarified butter and it works perfectly. Easy to clean and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best nut bags ever!!! I have used nut bags in the past and they were lame! We do not like any grit left in our almond milk. Most bags leave lots of granules and grit behind. These bags leave zero grit behind and very easy to clean!! I will only use these bags from now on! Thank you for being earth friendly too!!!! =)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Organic is important
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this once. That said, it’s my first cloth nut bag. The others are all nylon. Because it’s more of a fabric the liquid didn’t come through as fast. That said, I’m glad to have an organic bag so it’s a five star purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy3339

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!!
customer_reviews.text: To anybody that cares about the environment, this product is for you! I’ve been slowly converting to the zero waste movement and I am so happy companies like this exist. All packaging is compostable and the product itself is even biodegradable. Just tried it for the first time and I could not be happier! Keep up the great work, EcoPeaceful!
customer_reviews.author: Calista Pew

customer_reviews.title: Homemade almond milk
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a Vitamix so clearly we have to make homemade almond milk now. First nut bag I have ever used, but no complaints and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. N

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the Ultimate Nut Milk Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the bag and was extremely excited to make almond milk. This is absolutely the ultimate nut milk bag. It filters all of the pulp yielding a delicious creamy milk. It cleans & dries quickly. The purpose of the bag IS to remove ALL of the pulp. The product is doing exactly what it is designed to do. I've been looking for this forever. Thank you Lena Mumma
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: New to nut milks
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time making nut milks and this bag makes it a piece of cake! Easy to clean, easy to really squeeze all the water/milk out, and simply functional. I am hooked!!
customer_reviews.author: Julez

customer_reviews.title: Best but milk bag
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite nut milk bag. My milk is super smooth and the consistency is stellar. Easiest bag to clean too...this bag actually gets clean. My other bags are gross.
customer_reviews.author: lynn genser

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as hoped for ~
customer_reviews.text: We're using it to make our own almond milk - it works great. Very sturdy and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making celery juice.
customer_reviews.text: The bag works exceptionally well. It is smooth, filters nearly effortlessly, and is remarkably easy to clean. I use it to make celery juice and it comes out perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Bag did not strain
customer_reviews.text: Bag was woven too tightly, did not strain well at all
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: definitely buying again
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bags. I love how they come in packaging thats organic and are organic themselves and and the coolest part was the little papers inside telling your story and how to take care of the bags
customer_reviews.author: brady

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great!
customer_reviews.text: Greatbifvu just juice occasionally and don't want to buy a juicer.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Ene

product_meta.title: EcoPeaceful 12"x13" Organic Cotton Nut Milk Bag (ALL 100% Organic: Fabric, Stitches, Drawstring) + Silicone Band Closure - Almond Milk, Cold Brew Coffee, Celery Juice Fine Strainer Reusable Unbleached
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1| Size:12" x13"Hi, I'm Lena Mumma, a single mother & CEO of Eco Peaceful, LLC
After watching several plastic documentaries, I was shocked at how plastic affects wildlife & humans. I decided to change my lifestyle. I started growing my own food to reduce plastic packaging & started a zero-waste organic, plastic-free business in 2012. My first product was a reusable organic nut milk bag since I could not find any bag that was without synthetics, even GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) certified bags are sewn with polyester threads. So, I had to learn sewing & how to run a business. We offer the best organic bags:
✔️ ALL 100% ORGANIC: fabric, stitches, loop & drawstring made from 100% certified organic cotton, undyed & unbleached
✔️ FDA & LFGB FOOD GRADE SILICONE BAND CLOSURE
✔️ SEWN IN THE USA FROM ALL GOTS MATERIALS
✔️ LARGE SIZE: 12"x13"
✔️ ROUND CORNERS: for easier straining & cleaning
✔️ PLASTIC-FREE PACKAGING:
USE FOR MAKING: hot or ice cold brewing coffee, loose tea, nut milks (almond milk, coconut milk...) celery juice, nut cheese, tofu, vegetable bouillon. Also, shopping or storing produce.
VANILLA ALMOND MILK RECIPE
1/2 cup - almonds, soaked (min. 6 hours)
2-3 cups - water
A few - dates pitted or stevia (optional)
1 - Vanilla bean (seeds only) or vanilla extract
1)Blend well all ingredients in a blender
2)Pour all the liquid to the nut milk bag and squeeze liquid into container
Storage: store almond milk in a glass container in fridge for a few days or freezer for a few months
Pulp uses: add about 1/4% of almond pulp in your regular recipes of cookies, bread, pancakes, pizza crust...
feature_bullets: ✔️ 100% PLASTIC-FREE (NO NYLON, POLYESTER...). The EcoPeaceful Filter Bags are THE ONLY* Bags Made From 100% Certified Organic Cotton (Fabric, Stitches, Drawstring & Loop). NO hidden plastic/synthetic in: stitches, tags or elastic. *Based on empirical test result of dozens of "100% organic" strainer bags sold on Amazon.

⚠️ BEWARE of FAKE “ORGANIC” BAGS - Many other brands claiming "100% Organic Cotton stitching", "GOTS certified ", "no glue"... BUT our tests shows that many are NOT "Organic", contain glue, sewn w/ POLYESTER threads! WHY ORGANIC STITCHES are SO IMPORTANT: Nylon and Polyester threads are made from very thin fibers (plastic), wrapped into a single thread (not a solid thread), which frays into food, so you will end up eating micro-plastics!
✔️ DRAWSTRING & SILICONE BAND CLOSURE (Our Patent Pending Design): easily & tightly close & secure the bag.

🥛 SMOOTHEST NUT MILKS: The fabric is tightly woven, it works perfectly for cold brew coffee, teas, most juices (vegetable juice, celery juice) & nut milks (coconut, almond milk... ). NOTE: Starchy grains, gelatinous seeds (chia, flax) seeds are not suitable for using a bag. Commercial chia & flax milks are made from oil & thickeners, not from seeds.

👍 FREE RECIPES & SUPPORT: Dairy-Free Support, Videos & Recipes included with your bag. Recipes are focused on: high-nutrition and weight-loss, such as how to make delicious nut milks, fermented plant-based yogurt & cheese... and MUCH more! 🌱PLASTIC-FREE PACKAGING: Certified Compostable (ASTM D6400, OK Compost Home) cellophane bag & 100% post-consumer recycled paper inserts (with use & care instructions). All EcoPeaceful products are packaged Eco-friendly & plastic-free.
